author: dicka
msg: Provide support for nillable simple types

author: gdaniels
msg: DefaultSOAPEncodedTMI, because that means that SOAP encoded
types would be polluting the default typemapping.  According to
JAX-RPC (and common sense) the default TM is not supposed to have
JAXRPC type mapping now extends the normal type mapping, is
correctly registered as the defaultDelTM when using "1.3" as the
TypeMappingVersion (yuk), and there's a new test to check to make
sure SOAPENC_STRING is *not* mapped for the default TM no

author: perryan
msg: Added support to compile the generated stubs as a library and link the client code to it.
Changed TCP monitor program not to loop with a timeout.

author: whitlock
msg: AXISCPP-437 Migrate wsdl2ws fixes for soap faults to rpc-encoded. Also fix samples for faults.
